name: Anna Carroll
bio: Anna Carroll is a protocol engineer with years of experience architecting smart contracts for the EVM. Her areas of expertise include Solidity, cross-chain protocols, DAOs and governance. Throughout her time in the crypto space, Anna has worked on a range of projects including PartyBid, Nomad, Celo and Dharma. Anna graduated from Stanford with a degree in Computer Science and is now based in Berlin where she enjoys a vibrant crypto community.
